Description: [In 144-, 120-, 112-, and 100-pin versions] 0: CMOS output 1: Open-drain output [In 64- and 48-pin versions] 0: CMOS output 1: Setting prohibited
This bit is read as 0. The write value should be 0.
0: The level output on the MOSIn pin during MOSI idling is low. 1: The level output on the MOSIn pin during MOSI idling is high.
0: MOSI output value equals final data from previous transfer 1: MOSI output value equals the value set in the MOIFV bit
These bits are read as 0. The write value should be 0.
